name: Cardiovascular
query_fragment: "cardiovascular disease"[tiab] OR atherosclerosis[tiab] OR "coronary artery disease"[tiab] OR ApoB[tiab] OR "Lp(a)"[tiab] OR PCSK9[tiab] OR "heart failure"[tiab]

name: Metabolism
query_fragment: "insulin resistance"[tiab] OR hyperinsulinemia[tiab] OR "metabolic syndrome"[tiab] OR "GLP-1"[tiab] OR SGLT2[tiab] OR acarbose[tiab] OR "glucose variability"[tiab] OR CGM[tiab]

name: Exercise
query_fragment: exercise[tiab] OR "physical activity"[tiab] OR "resistance training"[tiab] OR HIIT[tiab] OR VO2[tiab] OR "zone 2"[tiab] OR "cardiorespiratory fitness"[tiab]

name: Sleep
query_fragment: sleep[tiab] OR "sleep apnea"[tiab] OR circadian[tiab] OR melatonin[tiab] OR CPAP[tiab] OR insomnia[tiab]

name: Neurodegeneration
query_fragment: dementia[tiab] OR "Alzheimer disease"[tiab] OR neurodegeneration[tiab] OR "cognitive decline"[tiab] OR "brain aging"[tiab]

name: Senolytics
query_fragment: senolytic*[tiab] OR senescence[tiab] OR "senescent cells"[tiab] OR dasatinib[tiab] OR quercetin[tiab] OR fisetin[tiab]

name: mTOR & Rapamycin
query_fragment: rapamycin[tiab] OR "mTOR"[tiab] OR sirolimus[tiab] OR everolimus[tiab]

name: Biomarkers & Clocks
query_fragment: "epigenetic clock"[tiab] OR "DNA methylation"[tiab] OR proteomic*[tiab] OR metabolomic*[tiab] OR biomarker*[tiab] OR "biological age"[tiab]

name: Fasting & CR
query_fragment: "caloric restriction"[tiab] OR "intermittent fasting"[tiab] OR fasting[tiab] OR "time-restricted eating"[tiab] OR autophagy[tiab]

name: NAD+ & Sirtuins
query_fragment: NAD[tiab] OR NMN[tiab] OR "nicotinamide riboside"[tiab] OR sirtuin*[tiab] OR SIRT1[tiab]

name: Metformin
query_fragment: metformin[tiab] OR AMPK[tiab]

name: Hormones & HRT
query_fragment: testosterone[tiab] OR "hormone replacement"[tiab] OR estrogen[tiab] OR DHEA[tiab] OR "growth hormone"[tiab]

name: Cancer Screening
query_fragment: "cancer screening"[tiab] OR colonoscopy[tiab] OR "liquid biopsy"[tiab] OR "early detection"[tiab]

name: Bone Health
query_fragment: osteoporosis[tiab] OR "bone density"[tiab] OR "bone mineral"[tiab] OR fracture[tiab]

name: Supplements
query_fragment: spermidine[tiab] OR "omega-3"[tiab] OR "fish oil"[tiab] OR "vitamin D"[tiab] OR creatine[tiab]

name: ITP Results
query_fragment: "Interventions Testing Program"[tiab] OR "ITP"[tiab] AND (aging[tiab] OR lifespan[tiab] OR longevity[tiab]) OR "NIA ITP"[tiab]

name: Mitochondria
query_fragment: mitochondri*[tiab] OR "mitochondrial biogenesis"[tiab] OR PGC-1alpha[tiab] OR "mitochondrial dysfunction"[tiab] OR mitophagy[tiab]

name: Telomeres
query_fragment: telomer*[tiab] OR telomerase[tiab] OR "telomere length"[tiab]

name: Klotho
query_fragment: klotho[tiab] OR "alpha-klotho"[tiab]

name: Reprogramming
query_fragment: "partial reprogramming"[tiab] OR "cellular reprogramming"[tiab] OR Yamanaka[tiab] OR "epigenetic reprogramming"[tiab] OR "OSK factors"[tiab]

name: Tirzepatide & GIP
query_fragment: "tirzepatide"[tiab] OR "retatrutide"[tiab] OR "dual GIP/GLP-1"[tiab] OR "triple agonist"[tiab] OR "GIP agonist"[tiab]

name: Parabiosis
query_fragment: "young blood"[tiab] OR "parabiosis"[tiab] OR "plasma exchange"[tiab] OR "plasma dilution"[tiab] OR "heterochronic"[tiab]

name: Heat & Cold Stress
query_fragment: "heat shock"[tiab] OR sauna[tiab] OR "cold exposure"[tiab] OR "cold shock"[tiab] OR thermogenesis[tiab] OR "brown adipose"[tiab]

name: Glycine & Taurine
query_fragment: (glycine[tiab] OR taurine[tiab]) AND (aging[tiab] OR longevity[tiab] OR lifespan[tiab])

name: Alpha-ketoglutarate
query_fragment: "alpha-ketoglutarate"[tiab] OR "AKG"[tiab] AND aging[tiab]

name: FOXO
query_fragment: FOXO[tiab] OR "FOXO3"[tiab] AND (longevity[tiab] OR aging[tiab])
